title: An Act authorizing the Division of Capital Asset Management and Maintenance to convey an easement across certain property in the Dorchester section of the city of Boston to the Boston Gas Company

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Collins, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2111) of Nick Collins for legislation to authorize the Division of Capital Asset Management and Maintenance to convey an easement across certain property in the Dorchester section of the city of Boston to the Boston Gas Company.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 04/09/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
Reporting date extended to Saturday January 31, 2026
